summary: This document contains email correspondence primarily between Amanda Kirby and Lesley Groff regarding scheduling a breakfast meeting involving Jeffrey. The communication reflects the tentative nature of the meeting and the need for further confirmation.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a breakfast meeting and is in communication with Lesley Groff regarding scheduling.

persons.name: Lesley Groff
persons.context: Lesley Groff is involved in the scheduling of a meeting and is responding to Amanda Kirby's emails.

persons.name: Jeffrey
persons.context: Jeffrey is the individual whose schedule is being accommodated for the breakfast meeting.

connections.description: Amanda and Lesley are working together to schedule a meeting involving Jeffrey.
Lesley is assisting in scheduling meetings for Jeffrey.
Amanda is coordinating a meeting that involves Jeffrey.

events.title: Breakfast Meeting
events.description: A breakfast meeting is tentatively scheduled for October 10th, pending confirmation from Jeffrey.

keyFacts: Amanda Kirby is coordinating a breakfast meeting for October 10th.
Lesley Groff is assisting in the scheduling of the meeting.
Jeffrey has not yet confirmed his availability for the proposed meeting.
